data.title: New York LaGuardia Airport (LGA) Airlines and Terminals: Airlines at Airports in New York Area, NY, USA
meta_keywords: new york laguardia international airport lga served domestic airlines flying new york seven main terminal buildings four concourse areas new york lga airport airlines usually board their designated terminals
data.meta_description: New York LaGuardia International Airport (LGA) is served by many domestic airlines, flying to and from New York.  With seven main terminal buildings and four concourse areas at New York LGA Airport, airlines usually board from their designated terminals.
